name: PCF857X library
keywords: digital, i2c, encoder, expander, pcf8574, pcf8574a, pcf8575, pcf8575a, esp32, esp8266, stm32, SAMD, Arduino, wire
description: Most starred PCF857X library. i2c digital expander for Arduino, esp32, SMT32 and ESP8266. Can read write digital values with only 2 wire. Very simple to use and encoder support.
